languages.text: "Еще бы тебе не благодарить! Судя по этой операции, вас учат только стоять навытяжку и умирать по приказу".
"Yes, you should be thanking me! Judging by this operation, all they teach you is how to stand at attention and die when ordered."
languages.original_text: "Еще бы тебе не благодарить! Судя по этой операции, вас учат только стоять навытяжку и умирать по приказу".

traits.locale_text: "Yes, you should be thanking me! Judging by this operation, they only teach you Arbitrators how to stand at attention and die when ordered to do so."
"Yes, you should be thanking me! Judging by this operation, they only teach you Arbitrators how to stand at attention and die when ordered to do so."
"Yes, you should be thanking me! Judging by this operation, all they teach you Arbitrators is how to stand at attention and die when ordered."
"Yes, you should be thanking me! Judging by this operation, all they teach you Arbitrators is how to stand at attention and die when ordered."
"Yes, you should be thanking me! Judging by this operation, all they teach you is how to stand at attention and die when ordered."
"Yes, you should be thanking me! Judging by this operation, all they teach you is how to stand at attention and die when ordered."

languages.text: «¡Sí, debería darme las gracias! A juzgar por esta operación, solo les enseñan a ponerse firmes y morir cuando se lo ordenan».
languages.original_text: "Yes, you should be thanking me! Judging by this operation, all they teach you is how to stand at attention and die when ordered."

traits.locale_text: «¡Sí, debería darme las gracias! A juzgar por esta operación, solo les enseñan a ponerse firmes y morir cuando se lo ordenan».

languages.text: “是啊，你真得好好感谢感谢我！从这场行动来看，他们只教会了你们怎么立正，怎么送死。”
languages.original_text: "Yes, you should be thanking me! Judging by this operation, all they teach you is how to stand at attention and die when ordered."

traits.locale_text: “是啊，你真得好好感谢感谢我！从这场行动来看，他们只教会了你们怎么立正，怎么送死。”

languages.text: « Un peu, que vous me devez des remerciements ! À en juger par cette opération, les seuls enseignements dispensés par l'Arbites se résument à claquer des talons et à mourir quand on vous en donne l'ordre. »
languages.original_text: "Yes, you should be thanking me! Judging by this operation, all they teach you is how to stand at attention and die when ordered."

traits.locale_text: « Un peu, que vous me devez des remerciements ! À en juger par cette opération, les seuls enseignements dispensés par l'Arbites se résument à claquer des talons et à mourir quand on vous en donne l'ordre. »

languages.text: 「そうだ。{mf|俺|私}に感謝すべきだ！この作戦で判断するに、彼らが君に教えることはすべて、目立つ立ち方と命令を受けて死ぬ方法だ」
languages.original_text: "Yes, you should be thanking me! Judging by this operation, all they teach you is how to stand at attention and die when ordered."

traits.locale_text: 「そうだ。{mf|俺|私}に感謝すべきだ！この作戦で判断するに、彼らが君に教えることはすべて、目立つ立ち方と命令を受けて死ぬ方法だ」

languages.text: "Çok doğru, bana teşekkür etmelisin! Harekâttan gördüğüm kadarıyla siz öğrettikleri tek şey, hazır olda durmanız ve emredildiğinde ölmeniz."
languages.original_text: "Yes, you should be thanking me! Judging by this operation, all they teach you is how to stand at attention and die when ordered."

traits.locale_text: "Çok doğru, bana teşekkür etmelisin! Harekâttan gördüğüm kadarıyla siz öğrettikleri tek şey, hazır olda durmanız ve emredildiğinde ölmeniz."

languages.text: "Ja, Ihr solltet mir danken! Dieser Operation nach zu urteilen, bringen sie Euch nur bei, strammzustehen und zu sterben, wenn man es Euch befiehlt."
languages.original_text: "Yes, you should be thanking me! Judging by this operation, all they teach you is how to stand at attention and die when ordered."

traits.locale_text: "Ja, Ihr solltet mir danken! Dieser Operation nach zu urteilen, bringen sie Euch nur bei, strammzustehen und zu sterben, wenn man es Euch befiehlt."
